localization¶

This module contains several Python based implementations for localization. Including a basic Kalman Filter, and base classs for the Extended and Unscented Kalman Filter variants and a Particle Filter base class.

Planned future work includes:

  • completion of the base particle filter

  • Implementation of a geo-physical particle filter for topographic, magnetic, and gravimetric navigation

Modules

localization.examples

Examples for how to implement and use the localization tools.

localization.gaussian

Gaussian module contains bases for Gaussian implementations of Bayes Filter.

localization.nonparameteric

Module for nonparameteric implementations of Bayesian Filters.

PySLAM
